original: $TITLE|Y$
Assimilating this culture group gives no benefits.
translation: 同化该文化组无任何好处。

original: Turkoman Gunners
translation: 土库曼火枪手

original: Turkoman gunners have joined our armies following our conquest of the Central Asian steppe. Our enemies will cower before the sound of our firearms!
translation: 在我们征服中亚草原后，土库曼火枪手加入了我们的军队。 让我们的敌人在我们的枪声面前颤抖吧！

original: The Baltic Trade
translation: 波罗的海贸易

original: Grain from Poland, pelts from Russia, the Baltic sea have always been buzzing with ships trading precious goods. As such many well established and wealthy ports cover its grand coast.
translation: 来自波兰的粮食，来自俄罗斯的毛皮，载着这些贵重货物的船只在波罗的海来回游弋，海岸边便因此建立起了许多维护良好的富饶港口。

original: Rule the Waves
translation: 制霸海洋

original: If there is a defining feature of British rule, it is naval dominance. Their ships and naval tactics far outmatch any others. With their ships in our own fleet, we shall rule the waves!
translation: 如果说大不列颠有什么明显的特征的话，那便是不可一世的海军了吧。 这只舰队及其战术远超别国， 当这些船只在我们手中时，我们将制霸海洋！

original: Burman Martial Leadership
translation: 缅甸军师

original: Burman nobility are expected to study the art of war throughout their lives. Their strategic expertise will serve us well.
translation: 缅甸贵族们被期许终生参研兵法。他们的专业知识将对我们大有益处。

original: Legacy of Rome
translation: 罗马的遗产

original: Many nations have taken up the mantle of the Roman Empire with varying degrees of perceived legitimacy. Shall we become yet another conquering people to appropiate its name?
translation: 许多拥有不同程度合法性的国家都曾自称为罗马帝国。难道我们不能成为另一个靠征服人民来夺取罗马之名的国家么？

original: The Black Legions of Carpathia
translation: 喀尔巴阡黑军

original: The rulers of Carpathia have for long relied on standing mercenary armies to protect their realms. Now with the mercenaries still present but nobody to buy their services we can press their prices down.
translation: 喀尔巴阡的统治者长久以来依赖常备雇佣军来保卫他们的国家。现在那些佣兵仍在此处，可是不会有人再购买他们的服务了，因此我们可以迫使他们降价。

original: Mamluk Slaves
translation: 马穆鲁克奴隶

original: The Caucasus has long been the source of Mamluk slave-warriors, the likes of whom founded the first Delhi Sultanate. We shall continue this practice and bring these warriors into the fold.
translation: 高加索人长期以来都是马穆鲁克的奴隶战士的人力来源，而就是诸如此类的人建立了德里苏丹国。我们会继续招收奴隶战士并接纳他们。

original: Highlander Courage
translation: 高地人的勇气

original: The people in the north of the British islands are famous of their resistance against outsiders and resistance to normal shock-and-awe tactics. Now under our rule we can employ them in our armies to make them more resilient.
translation: 这些来自不列颠岛屿北部的人们以他们对外敌的抵抗与对通常的震慑战术的抗性而闻名天下。现在在我们的统治下，我们可以雇用他们进我们的军队来使军队更有适应力。

original: Jungle Warfare
translation: 丛林战

original: Thick jungles and perilous weather define the central regions of India. Its native people have found a way not only to survive there, but to thrive. We shall apply their knowledge to our military so that we can keep our armies supplied even in the most difficult terrain.
translation: 浓密的丛林和险恶的天气构成了印度的中部地区。当地土著不仅找到了生存的方法，而在那里茁壮成长。我们将把他们的知识运用到军队中，这样我们就可以在最艰苦的地区保持军队的供应。

original: Confucian Bureaucracy
translation: 儒家官僚机构

original: Chinese states have been guided by Confucian political philosophy for a millenia, creating efficient administrations and securing the legitimacy of the monarch. Though clearly misguided, elements of Confucian bureaucracy could be adapted for use in our own government.
translation: 千百年来儒家的政治理念指引着中国，形成有效率的统治，保障君主的正统。虽然有明显的误导，儒家官僚体制的一些成分可以被我们自己的政府吸收。

original: Kongolese Religious Syncretism
translation: 刚果宗教融合

original: Thanks to the Kongolese liberal view on religion the local ruling families are quite willing to provide tributes to the Mughal harem.
translation: 多亏刚果人对宗教采取放任态度，当地的统治者家族相当乐意为莫卧儿帝国上交贡赋。

original: Kingdom of Prester John
translation: 祭司王约翰的王国

original: The Horn of Africa has for centuries been a bastion of Christianity. The tale of Prester John lends its kingdoms legitimacy in the eyes of Christendom, while native kings claim descent from the Biblical King Solomon. We can exploit this legacy to promote our Empire and spread our faith.
translation: 几个世纪以来，非洲之角一直是基督教的堡垒。祭司王约翰的故事赋予了王国在基督教世界眼中的合法性，与此同时其国王声称其血统来自于圣经中的所罗门王。我们可以利用这个遗产来推广我们的帝国并传播我们的信仰。

original: South Indian Industry
translation: 南印度工业

original: Southern India is home to thriving industries for textiles, spices, and precious gemstones. The success of these industries is not a mere accident of geography, but the result of an intricate network of production and trade connections. There is much we can learn from this system that we could apply throughout our nation.
translation: 南印度是纺织、香料和珍贵宝石的产业兴旺之家。这些产业的成功不仅仅是地理上的偶然，还是生产和贸易之间错综复杂的网络联系的结果。我们可以从这个体系中学到很多可以运用在我们国家的东西。

original: Riches of the Swahili
translation: 斯瓦希里的财富

original: The eastern cost of Africa where the East Bantu people live is filled with riches. Thanks to the already established mines of the locals exploiting these valuable resources will be a simple task.
translation: 东班图人居住的非洲东海岸充满了财富。幸亏当地人已经建立了矿山，利用这些宝贵的资源将是一项简单的任务。

original: Mass Conscription
translation: 大规模征兵

original: The East Slavic peoples are able to raise vast armies, beyond the relative capacity of other states. They achieve this through mass conscription and the arming of the lower classes, a policy we have largely been reluctant to adopt. Perhaps there is some merit to these ways.
translation: 相对其他国家，东斯拉夫人能够招拢庞大的军队。他们通过大规模征兵和武装底层阶级来达到这个目的。虽然我们过去从未主动尝试过这种政策，但是也许这种方法还是有一些优点的。

original: East Indian Textile Production
translation: 东印度纺织业

original: Silk, cotton, and cloth fuel the East Indian economy. Their reliance on these goods has made the region a center of innovation for new production techniques, which we shall not hesitate to adopt ourselves.
translation: 丝绸、棉花和布料激发了东印度地区的经济。他们对这些商品的依赖使这个地区成为新生产技术的创新中心，而我们将毫不犹豫地采用这些技术。

original: Manchu Cavalry Tactics
translation: 满洲骑兵战术

original: The strength of the renowned Manchu cavalry is in their superior tactics. Outmaneuvering the enemy sets up opportunities for devastating flanking attacks. Though our own cavalry are far from unfamiliar with these methods, adding Manchu expertise to our own will make them truly formidable.
translation: 著名的满洲铁骑，其强大之处在于他们优秀的战术。凌驾于敌人的机动性会为毁灭性的侧翼攻击提供机会。虽然我们自己的骑兵对这些方法并不陌生，但是学习满族人的专业知识将使得他们真正的无可抵挡。

original: French Courtly Culture
translation: 法国宫廷文化

original: French aristocratic culture is renowned throughout the world. French diplomats and ambassadors ensure that the importance of their nation is conveyed internationally. They should be put to service in our nation.
translation: 法国贵族文化在全世界享有盛名。法国的外交官们和大使们确保他们国家的重要地位在国际上广为流传。他们应该为我们的国家服务。

original: German Printing
translation: 德意志印刷机

original: The invention of movable type has revolutionized global society, and the German people are at the center of it all. Control of the press will help us to spread our ideas and institutions to the far corners of our empire.
translation: 活字印刷的发明革命性地推动了全球社会的发展，而德意志正处于冲击的中心。掌握出版印刷可以帮助我们将我们的思想和理念传遍帝国的每一个角落。

original: Skirmishers of the Great Lakes
translation: 大湖区散兵

original: The tribes of the Great Lakes in Africa have trained excellent skirmishers. By incorporating them into our grand armies we can more efficiently pillage the riches of our enemies.
translation: 非洲大湖区的部落们长久以来训练着优秀的散兵。通过把他们合并入我们的大军，我们可以更有效率地掠夺敌人的财富。

original: Unrelenting Expansion
translation: 永无止境的扩张

original: As the various incarnations of the Delhi Sultanate have before us, we shall carve out a great Indian empire. Hindustan is only the beginning!
translation: 正如德里苏丹国之前许多伟大的先辈一样，我们将开辟一个伟大的印度帝国。印度斯坦只是个开始！

original: Iberian Colonialism
translation: 伊比利亚殖民主义

original: The people of Iberia have set their sights on the discovery and conquest of unknown lands, echoing our own expansionistic ambitions. As part of our nation, they shall conquer and settle where we command.
translation: 伊比利亚人民拥有着扩张的雄心，并将他们的视线放在了探索和征服未知世界上。作为我们国家不可分割的一部分，他们将会征服并定居在我们占领的地区。

original: Western Advisors
translation: 西方学者

original: Persian-speaking scholars and merchants are among the most qualified ministers available to us. Having incorporated many Persian centers of learning, we can begin to generate such advisors within the boundaries of our own nation.
translation: 擅长波斯语的学者以及商人是我们手下最得力的能臣。在吸纳了很多波斯的学识后，我们也可以在自己的国家培养一些这样的学者。

original: Japanese Samurai
translation: 日本武士

original: Japan's samurai warrior caste are legendary for their deeply entrenched values of absolute loyalty and utter refusal to surrender in battle. Though the quality of their blades is far inferior to our own metalwork, our own warriors would do well to learn from samurai values.
translation: 日本武士阶级因他们的绝对忠诚以及在战场上宁死不屈的精神而闻名四海。尽管他们的刀刃和我们的装备比相差甚远，我们的士兵仍然可以学习他们的武士精神。

original: Korean Literati
translation: 朝鲜文人

original: Korean politics is dominated to a great degree by competing scholarly ideas. This has created a literate culture of debate which, should we learn from it, will make our nation a hub of intellectual innovation.
translation: 朝鲜的政治环境一直很大程度受多角度的学术观点影响。这就往往会形成一场充满文化素养的辩论，这是我们应该学习的。采用该制度可以推动国家创新发展。

original: Renaissance Prince
translation: 文艺复兴亲王

original: The culture of renewal that has gripped Italy had created a culture eager to embrace new ideas and institutions. Our nation must match their willingness to adapt to the times as we integrate them.
translation: 意大利的复兴文化从没有衰退过，并逐渐形成一种易于接受新鲜事物和思想的新文化。我们的国家在兼并他们的同时，也必须从他们与时俱进的思想中学习。

original: Lost Knowledge
translation: 失落的知识

original: We have acquired subjects whose origin defy all logic. However they bring us many teachings from their way to wage wars.
translation: 我们已经获得了那些来源有悖于所有逻辑的属民。然而，他们给我们带来很多来自于他们交战方式的教诲。

original: Levantine Cavalry
translation: 黎凡特铁骑

original: The Arab world is renowned for its powerfully-built warhorses. Mounting our soldiers on these mighty steeds will make our cavalry even more fearsome on the battlefield.
translation: 阿拉伯世界素来以强壮的战马著称。让我们的士兵配备这些强健的马，可以让我们的骑兵令敌人更加闻风丧胆。

original: The Barbary Pirates
translation: 柏柏尔海盗

original: The Maghrebi cover the northern coast of Africa. They have a long experience of pirating the rich trade brought in by the Italian states. We should enlist them into our navy by making them Privateers.
translation: 马格里布几乎囊括了北非的海岸。他们在劫掠来自意大利城邦的商船这一件事上有丰富的经验。我们应该征召他们加入我们的海军并组建一支私掠船。

original: Malay Merchant-Princes
translation: 马来豪商

original: The Malay people have a long tradition of mercantile expertise. Any Malay ruler who wishes to be successful must have a firm grasp of trade policy and the relative strength of local merchants. This abundance of mercantile knowledge will serve us well.
translation: 马来人有着悠久的贸易专业传统。任何希望成功的马来统治者都必须牢牢把握贸易政策和当地商人的相对强度。这种丰富的商业知识将对我们大有益处。

original: The Western Reaches of Islam
translation: 伊斯兰的西部边境

original: We've united the Mandé people under our banner, our empire stretching from Africa all the way to Asia. Under our World Sultanate Islam shall be united.
translation: 我们已经将曼德人统一在我们的旗帜之下，我们的帝国已经从非洲一直延伸到亚洲。在我们的普世苏丹国之下，伊斯兰将会团结一致。

original: South-East Asian Temple Construction
translation: 东南亚寺庙建设

original: Colossal temples dominate the landscape of the Khmer and Vietnamese lands. Given our own interest in monument construction, there is surely much that can be gleaned from studying the architectural techniques of these cultures.
translation: 高棉和越南土地上的景观绝大多数都是巨大的寺庙。鉴于我们对建设纪念碑的兴趣，研究这些文化的建筑技术肯定可以收获很多东西。

original: Sailors of the Pacific
translation: 太平洋水手

original: The people of the Pacific are natural born sailors, traveling vast distances over the largest sea known. We should utilize them as an integral part of our navy to defend our shores.
translation: 太平洋上的人是天生的水手，可以在已知最大的海洋上航行很远的距离。我们应该运用他们作为我们海军的一个组成部分来保卫我们的海岸。

original: The Desert Nomads
translation: 沙漠游牧民

original: The Sahelian people are nomads of the Sahara, being able to travel vast distances over a terrain that normal men can not.
translation: 萨赫勒人是撒哈拉沙漠的游牧民，他们能够在正常人无法行走的地形上远行。

original: Nordic Rivalry and Innovativeness
translation: 北欧人的竞争与创新

original: Scandinavia have a long tradition of war, thanks to this there is a good surply of seasoned officers whose valuable knowledge we can draw from.
translation: 斯堪的纳维亚有悠久的战争传统，由于这个原因，北欧有大量经验丰富的军官，我们可以从中汲取宝贵的知识。

original: The Slavic Bulwark
translation: 斯拉夫堡垒

original: The Southern Slavs have acted as a bulwark for the rest of Europe against foreign invasions. By subjugating them we've proven the futility of it all and soon Europe shall submit to our rule as well.
translation: 南斯拉夫人充当了欧洲其他国家抵御外来侵略者的堡垒。通过征服他们，我们证明了一切堡垒都是徒劳的，很快欧洲也会屈服于我们的统治。

original: Southern African Gold
translation: 南非黄金

original: Southern Africa is abundant in gold, as such the locals have very efficent counting methods to make sure their inflation does not spiral out of control.
translation: 南非盛产黄金，因此当地人有着非常有效率的计算方法，以确保他们的通货膨胀不会急剧上升。

original: The Sudanese Trade Routes
translation: 苏丹人商队路线

original: The Sudanese have long established trade routes to cover the hazardous terrain of the land they occupy. Thanks to this their trade combines the southern parts of Africa with the wealth of Egypt.
translation: 苏丹人早已建立了覆盖他们土地上的危险地带的贸易路线。多亏了这点，他们的贸易把非洲的南部地区和埃及的财富结合了起来。

original: Horses of the Steppe
translation: 大草原骏马

original: The Pontic steppe is an excellent grazing ground for horses, used by the Tatars to great effect. Their aptitude for effective grazing patterns and breeding techniques will help us raise many horses for our cavalrymen.
translation: 东欧大草原对马匹来说是一片优秀的放牧场地，鞑靼人很好地利用了它。他们在有效的放牧模式和繁育技术上的天赋有助于我们为骑兵们筹备大量的马匹。

original: Tibetan Asceticism
translation: 藏族苦行主义

original: The monks of Tibet dedicate their lives to ascetic meditation in monasteries both accessible and remote. We would do well to emulate their devotion.
translation: 西藏的僧侣把他们的生命奉献给在开放而又遥远的寺庙里苦行冥想。我们会效仿他们的奉献精神。

original: The Finno Pride
translation: 芬兰骄傲

original: The Finno-Ugric people call the icy north of the old world their home, a land most people would call barren of life.
translation: 旧世界北方被冰雪覆盖的极地——一片被许多人称为不毛之地的地方——被芬兰-乌戈尔人称呼为自己的家园。

original: West African Ruling Class
translation: 西非统治阶级

original: Our empire stretching as far as the tribes of West Africa, we've become increasingly reliant on distant local rulers. Over time however we are learning to integrate these local hierarchies into our own, slowly eroding local rule and ending their autonomy.
translation: 随着我们的帝国一直延伸到西非部落，我们越来越依赖于遥远的当地统治者。然而，随着时间的推移，我们正在学习将这些本地领导层合并到我们自己之中，慢慢地侵蚀当地的统治并结束它们的自治。

original: Slavic Generals
translation: 斯拉夫将军

original: The west Slavs have over decades produced leaders for armies that excel in using new weaponry to their fullest with unorthodox tactics. With them subjugated we should utilize this to the fullest.
translation: 西斯拉夫人几十年来为军队培养了许多擅长用非常规战术与新式武器的将军。继他们被我们征服之后，我们应该充分利用这一点。

original: Gujarati Traders
translation: 古吉拉特商人

original: Merchants based in Gujarat travel the great expanse of the Indian Ocean seeking opportunities for profit. They have refined trade into a precise science, which will be of great use to us when we assimilate their ports.
translation: 位于古吉拉特的商人们驶遍印度洋的广阔海域寻找赚取利润的机会。他们把贸易提炼为一门精密的科学，当我们吸收他们的港口时，这将对我们大有用处。

original: Thai Urbanization
translation: 泰国城市化

original: The 'mandala' political model common among the Thai peoples has the ruler and his city at the center of the world. The intense focus on the importance of the capital leads the Thai people to create massive cities capable of supporting millions of inhabitants. As we control several great cities of our own, the Thai proficiency for urban development will be of great interest to us.
translation: 在泰国人中普遍存在的「曼荼罗」政治模式使统治者和他的城市成为世界的中心。对首都重要性的强烈关注导致泰国人民建立了能够支持数百万居民的大城市。因为我们自己也控制着几座大城市，泰国人对城市发展的精通将对我们大有益处。
